compatible.description: Our service is compatible with many excellent applications on various platforms. We are progressing with developers, updating in real-time, just to provide the best experience
compatible.statement: (* Not being displayed does not mean it is not supported)
compatible.title: Rich third-party application compatibility

description: Our 100+ nodes are distributed across 10+ countries or regions around the world, providing you with a better user experience and accessible content.

features.description: No complex steps, you can register an account in as little as 30 seconds
features.title: Quick Registration

features.description: Our 100+ nodes are distributed across 10+ countries or regions around the world, and all our nodes maintain high-speed standards, so you can go wherever you want
features.title: Multi-regional

features.description: Our nodes are maintained by an excellent technical department, and we maintain a good relationship with operators, greatly reducing costs
features.title: Cost Saving

features.description: Cheer for our excellent technical department! They have specially optimized the routing of our nodes to provide lower latency and higher speeds
features.title: Better Routing

features.description: Thanks to the excellent third-party software developers, our nodes can be used on Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and routers. Special thanks to them for their contributions
features.title: One-click Connection

features.description: Your data will be transmitted in encrypted form. It's not only encrypted transmission, but also high-priority encrypted transmission. You can also choose your favorite encryption method yourself
features.title: Encrypted Seamlessly

0.description: As long as you are a new registered user, you can try it out as soon as you log in.
0.title: Do you offer a trial?

1.description: Yes, our lines are specially optimized for mainland China.
1.title: Can I use it in mainland China?

2.description: Don't worry, our technical department is constantly monitoring, and they are the best.
2.title: Is it stable?

3.description: Yes, most of our servers are not subject to Netflix's regional restrictions.
3.title: Can I watch Netflix?
